query:
-- Fix Access Pass (one-time only, $27 founding / $47 regular)
UPDATE membershipTiers 
SET priceOneTime = 4700,
    foundingPriceOneTime = 2700,
    priceMonthly = NULL,
    foundingPriceMonthly = NULL
WHERE slug = 'access_pass';

-- Fix Workshop ($97 one-time, was $197)
UPDATE membershipTiers 
SET priceOneTime = 9700,
    foundingPriceOneTime = NULL,
    priceMonthly = NULL,
    foundingPriceMonthly = NULL
WHERE slug = 'workshop';

-- Fix Starter ($97/month, was $147/month)
UPDATE membershipTiers 
SET priceMonthly = 9700,
    foundingPriceMonthly = 14700,
    priceOneTime = NULL,
    foundingPriceOneTime = NULL,
    workshopTokensPerMonth = 2
WHERE slug = 'starter';

-- Fix Lite ($300/month, was $397/month)
UPDATE membershipTiers 
SET priceMonthly = 30000,
    foundingPriceMonthly = 39700,
    priceOneTime = NULL,
    foundingPriceOneTime = NULL
WHERE slug = 'lite';

SELECT slug, name, priceOneTime, foundingPriceOneTime, priceMonthly, foundingPriceMonthly, workshopTokensPerMonth FROM membershipTiers WHERE slug IN ('access_pass', 'workshop', 'starter', 'lite', 'pro') ORDER BY displayOrder;
